mil5.1.7:1.3_0: Puna ca parinibbānasamaye subhaddena paribbājakena pañhaṁ puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
mil5.1.7:1.6_2: tena hi ‘asuñño loko arahantehi assā’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.1.7:1.8_2: vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassatī’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.1.7:1.9_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gahanatopi gahanataro balavatopi balavataro gaṇṭhitopi gaṇṭhitaro,
mil5.1.7:1.9_2: tattha te ñāṇabalavipphāraṁ dassehi makaro viya sāgarabbhantaragato”ti.
mil5.1.7:2.1_0: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘pañceva dāni, ānanda, vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassatī’ti.
mil5.1.7:2.3_0: ‘ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṁ, asuñño loko arahantehi assā’ti.
mil5.1.7:2.4_3: ayaṁ paṭipatti paridīpanāti dūraṁ vivajjitā te ubho aññamaññaṁ.
mil5.1.7:2.6_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, te ubho aññamaññaṁ dūraṁ vivajjitā.
mil5.1.7:3.1_2: rasato te saṁsanditvā kathayissāmi ‘pañceva dāni, ānanda,
mil5.1.7:3.1_3: vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassatī’ti yaṁ bhagavā āha,
mil5.1.7:3.2_0: Pañceva dāni, ānanda, vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassatī’ti.
mil5.1.7:3.3_1: bhagavā evaṁ vadanto saddhammassa antaradhānaṁ vā vadeti abhisamayaṁ vā paṭikkosatī”ti?
mil5.1.7:3.6_1: puriso naṭṭhāyiko sabbasesakaṁ gahetvā janassa paridīpeyya ‘ettakaṁ me bhaṇḍaṁ naṭṭhaṁ,
mil5.1.7:3.7_1: bhagavā naṭṭhaṁ paridīpayanto sesakaṁ devamanussānaṁ kathesi ‘pañceva dāni, ānanda,
mil5.1.7:3.9_0: ‘pañceva dāni, ānanda, vassasatāni saddhammo ṭhassatī’ti, sāsanaparicchedo eso.
mil5.1.7:4.1_0: Yaṁ pana parinibbānasamaye subhaddassa paribbājakassa samaṇe parikittayanto āha—
mil5.1.7:4.2_4: tvaṁ pana taṁ paricchedañca paridīpanañca ekarasaṁ karosi.
mil5.1.7:4.3_0: Yadi pana te chando, ekarasaṁ katvā kathayissāmi, sādhukaṁ suṇohi manasikarohi avikkhittamānaso.
mil5.1.7:5.1_1: taḷāko bhaveyya navasalilasampuṇṇo sammukhamuttariyamāno paricchinno parivaṭumakato,
mil5.1.7:5.1_2: apariyādiṇṇeyeva tasmiṁ taḷāke udakūpari mahāmegho aparāparaṁ anuppabandho abhivasseyya,
mil5.1.7:5.1_4: tasmiṁ taḷāke udakaṁ parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyyā”ti?
mil5.1.7:5.6_0: Yadi tattha buddhaputtā ācārasīlaguṇavattapaṭipattimeghavassaṁ aparāparaṁ anuppabandhāpeyyuṁ abhivassāpeyyuṁ.
mil5.1.7:5.7_2: imamatthaṁ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘ime ca, subhadda,
mil5.1.7:6.1_1: mahati mahāaggikkhandhe jalamāne aparāparaṁ sukkhatiṇakaṭṭhagomayāni upasaṁhareyyuṁ,
mil5.1.7:6.2_0: “Na hi, bhante, bhiyyo bhiyyo so aggikkhandho jaleyya, bhiyyo bhiyyo pabhāseyyā”ti.
mil5.1.7:6.3_1: dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā jinasāsanavarampi ācārasīlaguṇavattapaṭipattiyā jalati pabhāsati.
mil5.1.7:6.4_1: taduttariṁ buddhaputtā pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatā satatamappamattā padaheyyuṁ,
mil5.1.7:6.4_4: evamidaṁ jinasāsanavaraṁ bhiyyo bhiyyo ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ tiṭṭheyya,
mil5.1.7:6.4_5: asuñño loko arahantehi assāti imamatthaṁ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘ime ca, subhadda,
mil5.1.7:7.3_4: asuñño ca loko arahantehi assāti imamatthaṁ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘ime ca, subhadda,
mil5.1.7:7.4_0: Paṭipattimūlakaṁ, mahārāja, satthusāsanaṁ paṭipattikāraṇaṁ paṭipattiyā anantarahitāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
mil5.1.7:8.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘saddhammantaradhānan’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ saddhammantaradhānan”ti?
